column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////One of a few recommendations made to me for my Chicago visit.  It was a Friday night with no reservations but was able to sneak into a spot at the bar.  I wasn't in the mood for a heavy meal so I had the Crab & Avocado Salad
column2: the Bone Marrow with a glass of bourbon.  Everything was fantastic
column3: the bartender was very friendly and attentive
column4: the salad was great with plenty of Crab and Avocado.  The bone marrow and toast were piled high and excellent as well.  I regret not trying a steak there but am extremely satisfied with what I had.  Definitely on my list to go back to next time I'm in town
